mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comment (post_id, user_id, parent_id, content, create_time) VALUES (#{post_id}, #{user_id}, #{parent_id}, #{content}, #{create_time})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, a.username, a.avatar FROM post_comment c LEFT JOIN account a ON c.user_id = a.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
